channel.title: The noobyest question yet
channel.description:
Hey guys im new to whonix so bare with me please.
Im trying to install some software (mullvad). Ive downloaded the linux version but am stuck on how to install it. Ive looked at the installing software help page, it says something about apt-get (in konsole) but im still baffled.
Im sure its something really simple that i have over-looked...
Help will be appreciated, thanks

item.title: The noobyest question yet
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It’s non-trivial. And maybe not even worth the effort. See also:
